groups.name: Content
groups.description: Requirements related to the substantive content of the articles.

requirements.description: An article should start with a clear definition in the lead section.
requirements.reference: The first sentence of the lead should define what the scope of the article is.

requirements.description: The lead section should summarize the most important points of the article.
requirements.reference: The lead should summarize the most important points of the article.

requirements.description: Articles should be written in a neutral point of view.
requirements.reference: Articles must be written from a neutral point of view.

requirements.description: Avoid using jargon and technical terms without explanation.
requirements.reference: Avoid using jargon and technical terms without explanation.

requirements.description: Provide context for the topic in the introduction.
requirements.reference: The introduction should provide context for the topic.

groups.name: Formatting
groups.description: Requirements related to the visual and structural formatting of articles.

requirements.description: Use section headings to organize content.
requirements.reference: Use section headings to organize content.

requirements.description: Use bullet points for lists where appropriate.
requirements.reference: Use bullet points for lists where appropriate.

requirements.description: Ensure consistent use of fonts and styles.
requirements.reference: Ensure consistent use of fonts and styles.

groups.name: Language Usage
groups.description: Guidelines for the appropriate use of language, including gene nomenclature and abbreviations.

requirements.description: Human gene names should be written in all capitals.
requirements.reference: Human gene names are written in capitals, for example ALDOA, INS, etc.

groups.name: Citations
groups.description: Requirements for citing sources and references within the article.

requirements.description: All statements should be verifiable with reliable sources.
requirements.reference: All statements should be verifiable with reliable sources.

requirements.description: Use inline citations for direct quotes.
requirements.reference: Use inline citations for direct quotes.

groups.name: Infoboxes
groups.description: Guidelines for the use and formatting of infoboxes in articles.

requirements.description: Include an infobox for articles about people.
requirements.reference: Include an infobox for articles about people.

requirements.description: Ensure infoboxes are complete and accurate.
requirements.reference: Ensure infoboxes are complete and accurate.

groups.name: Structure
groups.description: Guidelines for the overall structure and organization of articles.

requirements.description: Articles should follow a logical structure.
requirements.reference: Articles should follow a logical structure.

requirements.description: Use subheadings to break up long sections.
requirements.reference: Use subheadings to break up long sections.
